data.eml:eml: A revision of the new genus Amiga Nakahara, Willmott & Espeland, gen. n., described for Papilioarnaca Fabricius, 1776 (Lepidoptera, Nymphalidae, Satyrinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nakahara, Shinichi, Lamas, Gerardo, Tyler, Stephanie, Marin, Mario Alejandro, Huertas, Blanca, Willmott, Keith R., Mielke, Olaf H. H., Espeland, Marianne (2019): A revision of the new genus Amiga Nakahara, Willmott & Espeland, gen. n., described for Papilioarnaca Fabricius, 1776 (Lepidoptera, Nymphalidae, Satyrinae). ZooKeys 821: 85-152, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.821.31782, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.821.31782
